markdownRemark.html: This club was the venue of the 2004 World Cup, the headquarters of the 2008 and 2010 Spanish Open and the Andalusian Open 2009, and has one of the best courses in Europe. Located in Alcala de Guadaira next to the bank of the Guadaíra River and the Oromana Natural Park, and not too far from the center of the city of Seville. This is a beautiful golf course with a good design and is superbly maintained.

frontmatter.title: Real Club Sevilla Golf
frontmatter.description: Real Club Sevilla Golf - This club was the venue of the 2004 World Cup, the headquarters of the 2008 and 2010 Spanish Open and the Andalusian Open 2009, and has one of the best courses in Europe. Located in Alcala de Guadaira next to the bank of the Guadaíra River and the Oromana Natural Park, and not too far from the center of the city of Seville. This is a beautiful golf course with a good design and is superbly maintained.
frontmatter.address: Autovía Sevilla-Utrera Km 3,2, 41500 Alcalá de Guadaíra (Sevilla), Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 125.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 165.00 euros
